english.segment1: Yesterday. Once again. I fell down and broke a friend. Words were said. Out of place. and I hope that it's not too late. To right this wrong. Cause I was wrong
english.segment2: I struck the match. and I burned the bridge. and I'm to blame for all of it. I lost your trust. When I drew my sword. This distance is my just reward. Can I undo the damage done
english.segment4: Couldn't sleep. Part of me. Was crying out from hurtin' you. So afraid. You would say. There is nothing I can do. To right this wrong. 'cause I was wrong
english.segment5: I struck the match. and I burned the bridge. and I'm to blame for all of it. I lost your trust. When I drew my sword. This distance is my just reward. Can I undo the damage done
english.segment7: Listen friend. I must confess. You deserve more. and I gave you less. as It tears me up. That I let you down. I'm sorry. I'm sorry
english.segment8: 'cause I struck the match. and I burned the bridge. and I'm to blame for all of it. I lost your trust. When I drew my sword. This distance is my just reward. Can I undo the damage done
